summary: Palladyne AI Corp. has granted a Participant an award of Restricted Stock Units (RSUs) that will vest in ten tranches, each contingent on achieving specific stock price thresholds and continued service. The award is subject to stockholder approval at the 2026 Annual Meeting, and no vesting will occur before such approval. If the stock price goals are met, vesting will occur incrementally over specified periods following the achievement date, with additional vesting provisions in the event of qualifying terminations of employment.
